This caravan vacuum cleaner stand is specifically designed to maximize space and convenience in your mobile living setup. Crafted for Makita compact vacuums, this wall-mounted bracket keeps your cleaning tool organized and readily accessible.

  • Wall-mounted design: Easily attach the stand to a wall in your caravan or RV to free up valuable floor space.
  • Custom fit for Makita compact vacuums: The stand is tailored to securely hold your Makita vacuum cleaner, preventing it from tipping over or falling.
  • Compact and space-saving: Its slim profile makes it ideal for caravans and RVs where storage is limited.

The stand is constructed from durable materials to withstand the rigors of travel and ensure your vacuum cleaner remains safely secured.

Enjoy a clutter-free caravan and effortless cleaning with this convenient vacuum cleaner stand.

  • Save valuable floor space in your compact living environment.
  • Keep your Makita vacuum cleaner organized and easily accessible for quick cleanups.
  • Prevent damage to your vacuum and ensure its safe storage during travel.

Simply mount the stand securely to a suitable wall surface in your caravan or RV. Then, place your Makita compact vacuum cleaner onto the designated bracket for easy storage and retrieval.
